title: Saint Jude, Plate 12 from the series Christ, the Twelve Apostles, and Saint Paul
marks:
Signature and Inscription

LLC of the sheet, pri LLC of the image, in the print: [HG. f.]
description: man with very short beard and long curly hair, with head tilted up toward PR; man holds book in his PR hand and has PL hand on his breast; cliff and rugged mountain landscape behind man; text at bottom:  \"XI. / CARNIS RESURRECTIONEM.\"
creditline: The Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
